txt.en: Many of the Woodmen's crates and containers were damaged during the avanc-attack. They managed to salvage many of the contents, but the containers need to be patched.

'[placeholder], will you hear me out? When the demons of the Rushgore attacked our boats, many of our crates and containers were damaged. We salvaged most of the contents, but the containers need to be patched to transport them safely when we arrive in the land of the Horse-lords.

'Will you go forth into the marsh and collect reeds strong enough to bind the containers and mud to patch them? While we scouted for an ideal camp-site, I saw a great burrow of mud and clay to the north-east of here. Perhaps you may find the materials I require there?

'Thank you for any assistance that you will provide.'
The burrow Gisalic mentioned lies to the north-east of the Woodman camp in the Rushgore.\n\nGisalic asked you to collect reeds and clay from the burrow he saw nearby.

'You say that you were attacked by great, envenomed insects at the burrow? That could bode ill for us, but it could also prove useful... let me think upon it.\n\n'As for the reeds and clay, aye... these will do well. Thank you!'
Gisalic is at the Woodman camp at the heart of the Rushgore.\n\nYou should return the materials you gathered to Gisalic and tell him of the insect infestation.
'Have you found the reeds and clay I require?'
Bring the reeds and clay to Gisalic at the Woodman camp in the Rushgore
